GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.4.223
GSD.description:
tipc: fix a null-ptr-deref in tipc_topsrv_accept

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.223 by commit 24b129aed8730e48f47d852d58d76825ab6f407c, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 0ef897be12b8b4cf297b6016e79ec97ec90f2cf6. For more details please see the references link.
